name: learn-ide
description: An integrated development environment for use with Learn.co

notifier.title: Learn Status Notifications
notifier.description: Receive desktop notifications that correspond to the lights on Learn.co

terminalFontColor.title: Terminal Font Color
terminalFontColor.description: A valid CSS color value which will be used to style your terminal's font

terminalBackgroundColor.description: A valid CSS color value which will be used to style your terminal's background
